channel.title: [PI] Increase the drop rate of a rare item?
channel.description: I recently added new bosses to my server, with trimmed dragon as drops. It seems like no matter how hard the players try, they cannot get the drop. and this one guy killed the bosses straight for 4 hours. help?

item.title: [PI] Increase the drop rate of a rare item?
item.dc:creator: @g0dp0wr g0dp0wr
item.description:
@g0dp0wr wrote:

alright cool, well i hope that helps. because that 1,000,000 on the 995 would make that drop near impossible.

in return i need your help do you have team viewer? i need my server online,… i feel like im missing something.

Read full topic
item.source: [PI] Increase the drop rate of a rare item?

item.title: [PI] Increase the drop rate of a rare item?
item.dc:creator: @13lack_drag 13lack drag
item.description:
@13lack_drag wrote:

[quote=“g0dp0wr, post:6, topic:447136”]alright that :X number could either be the amount of the item is dropped at one time, or how many chances it has to drop. like the 995 is obviously gold. so when you kill the monster you could be getting 1mil, or its adding, 1,000,000 chances of jus getting 1 gold piece. that all depends on your drop handler as well, if some items can have stackable drops.

Try this: take out all the drops for a monster, make it just 1 custom item you made, and see if everytime you kill it, if that item comes up everytime. if that is so, then just start adding other items to the drop pattern. id really recommend figuring out if the 2nd number is the stackable chance of getting the item, or how many times its considered in the drop pattern…

my hypothesis on the 2nd number, is that how many times the item is considered a chance to drop, only because if you notice i dont see too many repeated item numbers on each one of those.

lemme know if you try my theory of making a monster only drop 1 thing. and see if it drops it each chance. im sure it will…

hope it helped![/quote]

I figured out that you were right bout the 2nd number, its a misc. random for the items.say the number is 30. 1st item is misc.random 1. if it doesn’t do it, it moves on to the next number

Read full topic
item.source: [PI] Increase the drop rate of a rare item?

item.title: [PI] Increase the drop rate of a rare item?
item.dc:creator: @g0dp0wr g0dp0wr
item.description:
@g0dp0wr wrote:

alright that :X number could either be the amount of the item is dropped at one time, or how many chances it has to drop. like the 995 is obviously gold. so when you kill the monster you could be getting 1mil, or its adding, 1,000,000 chances of jus getting 1 gold piece. that all depends on your drop handler as well, if some items can have stackable drops.

Try this: take out all the drops for a monster, make it just 1 custom item you made, and see if everytime you kill it, if that item comes up everytime. if that is so, then just start adding other items to the drop pattern. id really recommend figuring out if the 2nd number is the stackable chance of getting the item, or how many times its considered in the drop pattern…

my hypothesis on the 2nd number, is that how many times the item is considered a chance to drop, only because if you notice i dont see too many repeated item numbers on each one of those.

lemme know if you try my theory of making a monster only drop 1 thing. and see if it drops it each chance. im sure it will…

hope it helped!

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Increase the drop rate of a rare item?
item.dc:creator: @13lack_drag 13lack drag
item.description:
@13lack_drag wrote:

g0dp0wr:

oh yeah, totally 83591 i think it was with the 31 following could mean thats how often it drops. give me all of that code for that avatar drop, and tell me what the item codes are. and ill reply with a write up for that monster, then u can configure your own with your dragon drops.

Rare items for creation: 19336, 19337, 19338, 19339, 19340, 15486, 14484

#Avatar of Creation 8596:40 1600:1 1602:1 1603:1 1606:1 1610:1 1601:1 1603:1 1605:1 1607:1 1609:1 1611:1 1613:1 3140:1 1612:1 1614:1 1381:1 175:1 1149:1 391:10 1432:1 1434:1 1437:500 995:1000000 1435:1 1438:500 1600:1 1602:1 1603:1 1606:1 1610:1 14484:1 15486:1 19336:1 19337:1 19338:1 19339:1 19340:1 14484:1

Rare items for destruction: 19341, 19342, 19343, 19344, 19345, 14484, 11235.

#Avatar of Destruction 8597:40 1601:1 1603:1 1605:1 1607:1 1609:1 1611:1 1613:1 3140:1 1612:1 1614:1 1381:1 175:1 1149:1 391:10 1432:1 1434:1 1437:500 391:10 1432:1 1434:1 1437:500 1601:1 1603:1 1605:1 995:1000000 14484:1 11235:1 19341:1 19342:1 19343:1 19344:1 19345:1 14484:1

item.title: [PI] Increase the drop rate of a rare item?
item.dc:creator: @13lack_drag 13lack drag
item.description:
@13lack_drag wrote:

[quote=“g0dp0wr, post:2, topic:447136”]i dont know the source version you are using, but i know on a 317. the monster drops, are based on how many items you have being dropped… like a 317 server looks like this. ex: 1050 santa hat. monster drop = 1050 995 995 995 995
so the santa is 1 out of 5 chance, to increase its chance either add more 1050 code, or decrease the rest of the drop.

hope this helps![/quote]

Im using hybrid pvp v3. My npc drops are in a file called npcdrops.tsm

Example:
#Avatar of Creation
8597:31 19436:1 19437:1 and so on…
I dont ^know what that # means. ^^ But then the tiems:

Read full topic
item.source: [PI] Increase the drop rate of a rare item?

item.title: [PI] Increase the drop rate of a rare item?
item.dc:creator: @g0dp0wr g0dp0wr
item.description:
@g0dp0wr wrote:

i dont know the source version you are using, but i know on a 317. the monster drops, are based on how many items you have being dropped… like a 317 server looks like this. ex: 1050 santa hat. monster drop = 1050 995 995 995 995
so the santa is 1 out of 5 chance, to increase its chance either add more 1050 code, or decrease the rest of the drop.

hope this helps!

Read full topic
